vehicles.description: A white van is situated in the left lane of the ego car, facing the opposite direction as the ego car
vehicles.explanation: Its presence requires attention as it could start moving or make unexpected maneuvers.

vehicles.description: A silver sedan is in the center of the intersection, facing a perpendicular direction to the ego car
vehicles.explanation: This car is potentially crossing the path of the ego car, so it's essential to monitor its movements to avoid a collision.

vehicles.description: Multiple vehicles are parked on the right side of the road, adjacent to the ego car's lane
vehicles.explanation: These parked vehicles reduce the width of the drivable road space and may obscure pedestrians stepping out from between them.

traffic signs.description: Several road signs can be seen on the right side at a distance, but the specifics are not clear from this image.
traffic signs.explanation: The ego car should monitor these signs as it gets closer to understand and comply with the upcoming road rules and conditions.

traffic cones.description: Orange traffic cones are placed on the left side of the road, directly ahead of the ego car
traffic cones.explanation: These cones indicate a construction or diversion zone, requiring the ego car to stay clear of the designated area.

suggestions: Maintain a cautious speed while approaching the intersection to observe the intentions of the silver sedan. The ego car should be prepared to yield if the sedan crosses its path. Additionally, the ego car should stay alert for any movement from the white van and be prepared to adjust its position if the van encroaches into the car's lane. Be watchful for pedestrians that may emerge between the parked cars on the right. Finally, respect the traffic cones by avoiding the left side and being prepared for possible lane shifts or roadwork ahead.
